title: 5 Things No One Told Us About Postpartum Recovery
subtitle: And How We Finally Fixed Them
description: We thought we knew everything about fitness...We'd studied it, coached it, lived it. But then we became mums, and suddenly, everything we thought we knew went out the window.
**We struggled with our pelvic floor.** Our cores felt weak, and our bodies just didn't bounce back the way we'd been told they would.

**We felt broken, alone, and frustrated.** Then we discovered the truth: our bodies weren't broken, they were just waiting for the right kind of recovery. So we went back to study, rebuilt from the ground up, and created the program we wish we had as first time mums.
